Detailed Description

This class implements a look-up table that can interpolate between entries.

It also implements boundary conditions.

Member Enumeration Documentation

Member Function Documentation

std::vector< Vector2 > const & LinearLUT::data (  )  const

Get the interpolation data.

Returns:
The data used to do the interpolation.

void LinearLUT::data ( std::vector< Vector2 > const &  d  ) 

Set the data for interpolation.

Parameters:
d The data as x,y pairs. Note that we resort the data based upon x-coordinate. We also assume that the data does not have any pairs where the x-coordinate is duplicated.
